body.name: XTU Doorbell Camera Wireless - Video Doorbell Camera with Wireless Chime, Voice Changer,2 Way Audio, AI Smart Human Detection, Works with Alexa & Google Assista, Real Time Alert for Home, 2.4GHz WiFi.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 13 hrs 41 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow 7 AM - 11 AM. Order within 10 hrs 56 mins
features: Voice Changer & Two-way Audio- XTU MR02 wireless doorbell camera can select a pre-recorded voice message to help you reply quickly. Besides, it's the extra set of eyes and ears needed to protect your home. With the upgraded feature of voice changer, MR02 wireless video doorbell can disguise actual gender and age to better protect privacy. Perfect for the elderly, children, and females living alone.

Easy to Install & Use- The WiFi Doorbell Camera supports 2.4GHz WiFi (5GHz WiFi is not supported). You can take less than 3 minutes to set up without having to use any complicated tools. Downloading CloudEdge App on Google Play/App Store can help you use it quickly. It’s compatible with iOS and Android.

Motion Detection & Night Vision- With the Doorbell Camera WiFi with Motion Detector Home Security Doorbell helps you maintain safety by viewing whoever is at your door without opening it. Night vision will auto switch day and night vision when it detects brightness around, showing the high-resolution video days and nights for you.

100% Wireless & Cordless- Built-in high-capacity rechargeable battery, and support battery and existing wiring powered. The installation and the connection of the doorbell camera, the chime are 100% wireless, which makes you enjoy the convenience of not have to deal with any outlets or tangled mess of wires.

Secure Cloud Storage & Local Storage- The Nest Doorbell Camera adopts financial encryption, supports up to 128G Micro SD storage, and Cloud storage. You’ll never miss out on a moment with remote and playback video with the encrypted Cloud service wherever you are.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MR02 WiFi Video Doorbell Camera 2.4GHz Wi-Fi Support: The XTU doorbell camera is exclusively compatible with 2.4Ghz Wi-Fi, ensuring fast and stable connectivity. (5GHz Wi-Fi is not supported) Complimentary Chime Included: Install the included doorbell chime in areas like your dining room, kitchen, or patio to be alerted when someone rings your doorbell. Pair one smart doorbell with multiple indoor chimes for added convenience. App Notifications: Receive call alerts when visitors press the doorbell.

Two-Way & Voice Changer Containing in microphone and speaker make it easier to talk to visitors whether you are at home or outside. XTU MR02 wireless doorbell camera has upgraded changing voices. Besides, it's the extra set of eyes and ears needed to protect your home. Designed for 2.4G Wi-Fi (5G Wi-Fi not supported), this doorbell camera comes with a free Doorbell Chime to ensure you never miss a visitor, no matter where you are.

1080P Full HD & Night Vision The Video Doorbell Camera can be used both day and night. It monitors your home in 1080P Full HD video with infrared night vision and live view, provides surveillance of all door activity. Night vision will auto switch day and night vision when it detects brightness around, showing the high-resolution video days and nights for you.

Motion Detection With the built-in motion sensor, this WiFi doorbell will send you an instant alert when there is human movement. You can take less than 3 minutes to set up without having to use any complicated tools. It’s compatible with iOS and Android.

Secure Cloud Storage & Local Storage The Nest Doorbell Camera adopts financial encryption, supports up to 128G Micro SD storage, and Cloud storage. You’ll never miss out on a moment with remote and playback video with the encrypted Cloud service wherever you are.

FAQ: Q: What APP does the doorbell camera support? A: The doorbell camera only support"CloudEdge" APP. Q: Is this wireless doorbell camera work with Alexa? A: Yes, this doorbell camera work with Alexa & Google Home. Q: What network mode is the video doorbell compatible with? A: The video doorbell only support 2.4Ghz Wi-Fi , not work with 5Ghz Wi-Fi Q:What‘s the operating conditions? A: You can use the doorbell camera in -5°F to 120°F (-20°C to 48°C). Q: Does the camera doorbell can be supported view in real time/live view? A: Yes, open the app and click on the live button, will allow you view any time in real time. Q: How to charge the doorbell camera? A:The doorbell camera is compatible with the DC 5V 1A or 5V 2A charger with Type-C interface. The package included the Type-C interface. Please fully charge the video doorbell before the first use (It takes 8 to 10 hours to fully charge). You can see the battery level on the app.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great low cost doorbell
reviews.reviewText: This is a really good doorbell at a great price point. Comes with a separate chime, which I haven't used. What is really great about it is that it takes a micro SD card with no requirement for monthly cloud storage like other brands who just want your money every month. Battery life has been great so far even as it's been colder lately. App could use some better integration with Google home and Alexa so I can have my echo as a chime. Also it needs to show an image or video when your doorbell is activated by a visitor. Very good doorbell on a budget or if your tired of monthly fees and poor battery life from that big brand name!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works perfectly well
reviews.reviewText: Works perfectly well . It was easy to install . Feel nice and light weight. I downloaded the app to monitor everything on my phone. It make me feel safe from the outside in. The video resolution is crispy and clear. I really like this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Value for the Price, With a Few Cons
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The video quality is really good. The live view can alternate between HD and SD, but the playback is only SD. I've only had it for about 2 weeks, so I can't speak to it's quality, but it seems good. The sound quality seems good, as well, but in playback, it's not always as loud.My biggest gripes are that sometimes it alerts immediately, sometimes it is delayed and doesn't even catch the person; and that any time it rains or it's foggy out, it blurs the view so it doesn't alert anymore. As you can see in the picture, the lens was wet, so the video was blurry and looked foggy when it wasn't. I have to wipe it off every morning.You can't beat the price, and for what you get it's totally worth it. Now I'm looking for a security camera that will also link to the same app and put on the side of the house that the doorbell view doesn't reach.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars value for money
reviews.reviewText: It has all the features that other named brands have, except that this product does not require monthly subscription. It is easy to install and easy to use. You have to follow the instruction and install an APP in order to use it, just like other products in the market.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't Buy This Doorbell Camera
reviews.reviewText: I had the camera for 4 months and the video quality went blurry doorbell chime stopped working batteries was still good... so I contacted the by Email they responded a few day later telling me to send a picture of the blurry camera I did they said they was going to send a replacement and never did 🤥 and they stopped responding to my Emails it's been over two weeks I've sent them several emails!😞

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Primary got this camera for porch pirates lol. This camera is awesome, inexpensive, and effective. I can see who passes my door by turning on the sensor feature. Whenever someone passes my door, it sends me a notification with a short clip. The video quality is amazing.I gave it a full charge when I first received it and it lasted a month. It gave me a warning of its battery percentage and reminded me to charge it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good product and easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This camera works great.
reviews.reviewText: I don't like that at a certain distance at night it's not to clear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: A very good and inexpensive video doorbell
reviews.reviewText: I recently got this doorbell camera, and I am very pleased with it! The compatibility with Alexa and Google Assistant adds incredible convenience to my daily life, enabling me to activate live view effortlessly. I absolutely love the Voice Changer feature, which disguises the gender and age of the person speaking, ensuring privacy protection during conversations with visitors. It offers various voice options like the original sound, uncle sound, and clown sound, making interactions fun and engaging.The PIR motion detection is top-notch, providing real-time alarm and push notifications upon any triggered motion. It helps maintain security by allowing me to view visitors without opening the door. Customizing the detection area is also convenient, eliminating false alerts and optimizing the video doorbell's battery life.The video quality is excellent, with 1080P HD and a wide 166° viewing angle, ensuring crystal-clear images and recordings. The built-in IR lights ensure crisp night vision up to 33ft, providing visibility even in the dark.Installation is a breeze, taking only 5 minutes without complex tools. The CloudEdge app is user-friendly, making it easy to set up and use. I use the same app for my battery powered CCTV cameras in my house as well - a very good app! The doorbell camera is designed with high-quality material and has an IP66 waterproof rating, making it safe to use in all weather conditions throughout the year.Overall, this is an ideal choice for anyone, especially the elderly, children, and individuals living alone. With its fantastic features, I highly recommend it for enhancing security and convenience at your doorstep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up. Fantastic image. Little blurry when pinch an zoom but no issue. Think I'll end up throwing chime box. Once linked to Alexa the chimes / sounds much better options. Battery lasting well so far (turned off motion detection). I live in a flat and my wifi near doorbell isn't great (Virgin media) but this doesn't stop doorbell from working. WiFi pods will help if anyone has issues. Overall for my first am more than happy. Extended warranty too with email offering a free gift. Happy New Year to this company and there staff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: At £45, this XTU MR02 was excellent value for money and support has been amazing with useful information – even before delivery. The XTU support videos offered are good, but I also found other videos and had it all working in 20 minutes. My only mistake was to put the sticky strip on the wooden door up the wrong way – however this would have only been a problem if I had also wanted to use the screw holes. The bell and chime work perfectly and I just need to now adjust the settings to alert me before visitors press the bell. I added it to Alexa and not only got the live images on my Alexa show and also then got them up on my Windows PC Alexa App.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very good product great inexpensive camera door bell! Quality images works very well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Arrived well packaged in a sealed box, which was promising.UNBOXING - 5/5After opening and checking contents of box, delighted that everything appeared to be there.Doorbell had all original factory protective films etc still in place.Manual recommends charging 8-10 hours, however when my doorbell arrived it had 80% battery, so was fully charged after 2 hours.Instruction booklet included was very simple to read and follow along with.SETTING UP - 5/5I already had the cloudedge app on my phone for other home security cameras, so it didn't need to follow this step, but the app is readily available on both Google store and Apple Store.After fully charging the device I then went about adding the new camera to Cloudedge. Set up was simple enough as cloudedge guides you through each step. After pressing the reset button on my doorbell and then clicking next on the app, Cloudedge had no problems finding the new device and had connected to it within 15-20 seconds. Job pretty much done.INSTALLATION - 4/5Firstly it is 100% wireless, so no electrical work etc required.Doorbell comes with an adhesive pad that attaches the doorbell to any smooth flat surface, also comes with a plastic doorbell housing which can be screwed to the wall, after which the doorbell can simply be clicked into position.I opted for this option, just for that extra bit of strength for anti theft purposes. Removing the doorbell from the housing unit is simple using the included pin (just like the pins used to remove SIM cards from your phone). I liked this feature as I've had other doorbells that simply pulled in and out of the housing unit, therefore should anyone wish to steal it, it would have been easy. However with this one it is far more secure and wouldn't be easy to remove unless you used the included pins.VIDEO QUALITY - 4/5This doorbell device is 1080p so does provide a clear image, the image isn't the best I've seen, but it's certainly not the worse either. For normal everyday use as a video doorbell then this doorbell ticks the box for quality.Also has Night Vision and does provide a clear enough image, however I also have a security light installed just above my door so when motion detected it switches on and doorbell camera returns to colour mode.SOUND QUALITY - 2/5Was abit disappointed with the loudness of the speaker on the doorbell itself, seems very low, even at 100%. Visitors may struggle to hear you if there is too much noise around them on the outside. Mic quality is pretty good, so no issues when listening in to the camera or hearing the visitor at the door, though I have had better sound quality with substantially cheaper video doorbells.CHIME UNIT - 0/5My chime arrived with a broken button (as seen in pictures), button is permanently in the 'in' position, which means I can't change the chime of the doorbell and I'm stuck to the one option, which whilst annoying, it isn't the end of the world. However that's not the only problem with this chime.A big letdown is the fact that it is battery operated, Many other doorbell manufacturers will provide you with a USB chime, which you simply plug in to a USB plug and then forget it. However this one you will have to keep an eye on your batteries.But the biggest disappointment is the fact that within the space of 2 hours I've had to 'pair' this chime with the doorbell twice already, even though it is only 4 feet away from the doorbell itself on the inside. So the chime not only arrived with a broken button, but also the connectivity between it and the doorbell is extremely unreliable, and what's the point of having a doorbell if it doesn't chime every time when it's pressed.WIFI CONNECTION - 5/5Connectivity between the doorbell and the WiFi has so far not been an issue. Doorbell is able to provide a good stream to your mobile device with very little lagging in between. Perhaps a 1 second delay between the actual event and the video itself, but this is pretty common with many recording devices.OTHER FEATURES - 2/5Motion detection, so unreliable it's almost pointless enabling this feature via the app.Advertised as 'works with Alexa', now when I read this, I expected when the doorbell rang then my Alexa devices would notify me and show me the doorbell as other competitors doorbells would. However this doesn't, now technically it does 'work with Alexa', but you have to ask Alexa to show you the doorbell camera and it will then provide you a live stream, pretty much like a CCTV camera, however if you expect this unit to 'ring through' to your Alexa if doorbell is pushed (as I did) then this device isn't for you, as it won't do it despite allowing the permissions on both Cloudedge and Alexa apps to do so. However it does ring through to your Cloudedge app on you mobile phone.CONCLUSIONInitially after opening the box I was delighted as doorbell seemed heavy and well built, and looked like it was a pretty solid purchase. I was eager to get it charged up, installed and put to daily use. However my enthusiasm was short lived, the door chime, sound quality and 'works with Alexa' features really let it down. And for a smart doorbell, these features are pivotal between what makes it a good purchase or a bad purchase, and for me, I more than likely will be returning this for a refund.
